long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Netflix IMDb Ratings Chrome Extension

Overview
Netflix IMDb Ratings is a Chrome extension that displays IMDb ratings directly on Netflix thumbnails. It helps you make informed decisions about movies and TV shows without leaving Netflix.

Features
ðŸ“Š IMDb Ratings on Netflix Thumbnails - Instantly see IMDb ratings displayed on top of movie and show thumbnails.

ðŸ”— Clickable Ratings - Click on the rating to open the IMDb page for more details.

âš¡ Fast and Responsive - Uses Chrome Storage for caching, ensuring fast performance.

ðŸ”’ Privacy Friendly - No tracking or data collection. Ratings are fetched securely from the OMDb API.

How It Works

- Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.

- Visit Netflix and browse movies or shows.

- IMDb ratings will automatically appear on thumbnails.

- Click the rating to open the IMDb page for more information.

Permissions
Storage: Used for caching ratings locally to improve performance.

Host Permissions: Access to OMDb API for fetching IMDb ratings.

Privacy Policy
We do not collect any personal data. For more details, check our Privacy Policy(https://maqomed.github.io/netflix-imdb-privac-policy/privacy-policy.html).

Known Issues

- Ratings may take a moment to load after scrolling.

- Cached data may occasionally need to be cleared manually from Chrome Storage.

- Disable ad blockers for smoother use
